entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 12:56 AM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: SW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 9:26 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:26 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
